scripts.publish-npm: cd pkg && npm publish --access public && cd ..
scripts.publish-npm-nightly: cd pkg && npm publish --access public --tag nightly && cd ..
scripts.publish: bun run build && bun run publish-npm
scripts.publish-nightly: bun run build && bun run publish-npm-nightly
scripts.build: npm run wasm:build && npm run wasm:postbuild
